description:
To celebrate the launch of Torna: The Golden Country, here's some bonus items to help you in your journey through Xenoblade Chronicles 2:

- Legendary Core Crystal x15
- Char-Grilled Grumbird x3
- Crispy Blendshake x3
- Clicky-Clacks x3
